name: Pandora's Box (TheGameMechanic)
description:
Pandora's Box is a simple 2D Side Scrolling platformer where you join Pandora on her quest to close her box and restore Hope to the world!

Controller Recommended

CONTROLS FOR KEYBOARD

[A] - Move Left
[D] - Move Right
[Space] - Jump
[Return] - Attack
[ESC] - Pause

CONTROLS FOR CONTROLLER (Xbox 360 / Xbox One)

[Left Stick] - Movement
[Right Stick] - Control Camera
[A] - Jump
[X] - Attack
[Start] - Pause

Game created by Test Developers, Please Ignore

ScottTheGameDev / TheGameMechanic
Pandi
